quality.reason: Rooms are spacious and clean with amenities, but bathrooms are small, noise issues are present, and some maintenance concerns exist.

location.reason: Centrally located in downtown Philadelphia, close to major attractions and public transportation.

service.reason: Mixed reviews on staff interactions, with some positive experiences but also reports of unhelpful service and inconsistent housekeeping.

safety.reason: Generally safe area with well-lit parking, though some concerns about nearby street disturbances.
